
To install the development version from GitHub (warning! this version may contain breaking changes and/or bugs), use the [`pak` package](https://pak.r-lib.org/):

```{r, eval = FALSE}
pak::pak(file.path("epinowcast", "baselinenowcast"))
```

Another option for installation is using the [`remotes` package](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/remotes/index.html):

```{r, eval = FALSE}
remotes::install_github("epinowcast", "baselinenowcast")
```
